title: Create generation-loading.tsx component
description:
Create app/fo-02/components/generation-loading.tsx:
- Props: name, batchNumber (1|2|3)
- Different copy per batch:
  - Batch 1: 'Creating your first affirmations, {name}...' / 'Based on what you shared with us'
  - Batch 2: 'Creating more affirmations just for you, {name}...' / 'We're learning from what resonated with you'
  - Batch 3: 'One more round of affirmations, {name}...' / 'These should feel even more personal'
- Include animated throbber/spinner
- No button - auto-advances when generation completes

See SPEC.md section 'Throbber Component'.
